project_descr: Enhancing the living conditions of 60 low-income earning families in Jerusalem, with focus on most needy and marginalized families suffering from severe housing conditions, through deployment of self-help modality.

outputs.output_descr: Renovation and rehabilitation of 60 houses in Jerusalem as part of strengthening of access to basic services
